selections.name: Turf Rocket
selections.reason: Consistent turf sprinter with Speed Figure (100) and Class (101) topping the field. Drops into a claimer where she fits perfectly.

selections.name: Annie's Joy
selections.reason: Posted a massive 107 Speed Figure two starts back. Recent form is solid, winning at this level.

selections.name: Classic Performer
selections.reason: Class dropper from Allowance company. Speed 104 on dirt, but turf resume (0/5) is the concern.

selections.name: Hittin My Stride
selections.reason: Reliable check-earner with a 98 Speed Figure. Should be in the mix for exotics.

danger_horse.name: Annie's Joy
danger_horse.reason: If she repeats her 107 Speed Figure effort, she beats this field.

selections.name: Mo Diva
selections.reason: Top Speed Figure (89) and Class (96) in this field. Consistent runner at this level.

selections.name: Broadway Star
selections.reason: Has a recent 94 Speed Figure which is competitive. Good post position for a stalking trip.

selections.name: Vanna G
selections.reason: Honest runner (Speed 85). Should be near the pace.

selections.name: Delightful Halo
selections.reason: Has a win at the distance and decent speed figures (90).

danger_horse.name: Broadway Star
danger_horse.reason: Capable of a big number (94) that challenges the top pick.

selections.name: Stress Test
selections.reason: Highest Speed Figure (105) and Class (96). Finished 2nd in a similar race last out, beating key rivals here.

selections.name: Truly An Honor
selections.reason: Ran 3rd behind the top pick last time. Speed 102. Logical exacta filler.

selections.name: Honor Azteca
selections.reason: Speed 100. Consistent performer at this level.

selections.name: Birkin Elegance
selections.reason: Speed 92. Needs to improve but has place chances.

danger_horse.name: Truly An Honor
danger_horse.reason: Very close to the top pick in ability; could turn the tables with a better trip.

selections.name: Don't Come Looking
selections.reason: Standout Speed (106) and Class (97). 8/5 ML favorite looks justified based on recent 2nd place finish.

selections.name: Sister Lily
selections.reason: Speed 100. Consistent runner, finished 2nd last out. The clear main threat.

selections.name: Divine Rose
selections.reason: Speed 106 matches the top pick, but form is slightly less consistent.

selections.name: Aegis
selections.reason: Speed 98. A cut below the top three but can pick up pieces.

danger_horse.name: Sister Lily
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and fast enough to win if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Diva Beach
selections.reason: Speed 99, Class 101. Drops slightly in class feel. Consistent turf performer.

selections.name: Becky'sgottahaveit
selections.reason: Coming off a win. Speed 93. Good form cycle.

selections.name: Snazzy Gal
selections.reason: Speed 92. Jose Ortiz aboard. Dangerous from the inside.

selections.name: Lady Star
selections.reason: Speed 99 matches top pick but form is slightly more erratic.

danger_horse.name: Becky'sgottahaveit
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is dangerous in this balanced field.

selections.name: Whtruwearingrlfrnd
selections.reason: Dominant 7-length win last out. Speed 104. Looks like a budding star.

selections.name: Thrill Seeker
selections.reason: Speed 106. Won last out as well. The only horse with speed figures to challenge #4.

selections.name: Braken Poppa
selections.reason: Speed 97. Solid, but likely running for 3rd behind the top two.

selections.name: Missin Missy
selections.reason: Speed 98. Good form but faces two monsters here.

danger_horse.name: Thrill Seeker
danger_horse.reason: Actually has a higher speed figure (106) than the top pick. A serious threat.

selections.name: Castle Run
selections.reason: Drops from high-class MSW races at Churchill Downs. Speed 105. Class of the field.

selections.name: Hitchcock
selections.reason: Speed 107 is the highest in the field. 4/1 ML offers value.

selections.name: Razorcat
selections.reason: Speed 97. Consistent placer. Good outside post for this distance.

selections.name: Restore (fr)
selections.reason: Speed 101. French import with ability. Watch the tote.

danger_horse.name: Hitchcock
danger_horse.reason: Possesses the raw speed (107) to wire this field if he breaks well.

selections.name: Closing Agent
selections.reason: Best recent Speed Figure (91). Drops into a winnable spot. Outside post is favorable.

selections.name: Jayjayjay
selections.reason: Speed 87. Consistent. 4/1 ML is fair.

selections.name: Custom Ride
selections.reason: Speed 89. Competitive at this level.

selections.name: Runner Runner
selections.reason: Speed 83. A step below the top three but can hit the board.

danger_horse.name: Jayjayjay
danger_horse.reason: Consistent runner who won't be far away at the finish.
